mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM FREE_CMT WHERE FREE_NO = #{freeNo} AND FREE_CMT_STATE = 1

SELECT A.ROW_NUM, A.FREE_CMT_NO, A.FREE_NO, A.NICKNAME, A.FREE_CMT_CONTENT, A.FREE_CMT_CREATE_DATE, A.FREE_CMT_MODIFY_DATE, A.FREE_CMT_IP, A.FREE_CMT_STATE, A.FREE_CMT_DEPTH, A.FREE_GROUP_NO, A.FREE_GROUP_ORDER FROM (SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY FREE_GROUP_NO DESC, FREE_GROUP_ORDER ASC) AS ROW_NUM, FREE_CMT_NO, FREE_NO, NICKNAME, FREE_CMT_CONTENT, FREE_CMT_CREATE_DATE, FREE_CMT_MODIFY_DATE, FREE_CMT_IP, FREE_CMT_STATE, FREE_CMT_DEPTH, FREE_GROUP_NO, FREE_GROUP_ORDER FROM FREE_CMT WHERE FREE_NO = #{freeNo}) A LIMIT #{begin}, #{recordPerPage}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO FREE_CMT (FREE_NO, NICKNAME, FREE_CMT_CONTENT, FREE_CMT_CREATE_DATE, FREE_CMT_MODIFY_DATE, FREE_CMT_IP, FREE_CMT_STATE, FREE_CMT_DEPTH, FREE_GROUP_NO, FREE_GROUP_ORDER) VALUES (#{freeNo}, #{nickname}, #{freeCmtContent}, DATE_FORMAT(NOW(), '%y-%m-%d %h:%i'), DATE_FORMAT(NOW(), '%y-%m-%d %h:%i'), #{freeCmtIp}, 1, 0, #{freeGroupNo}, 0)
